com.felix.util

Class KeyValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.felix.util.KeyValues

  • public class KeyValues
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for key values, might be read from string, e.g. "key1:value1, key2:value2, etc"
    Author:
    felix
